topics.title: Error on convert to HR?
topics.sample_questions: The app has many errors in conversion, making it unusable. | The app has many conversion errors making it unusable. | Need to edit the activity to correct the training data. | Need to edit the activity to correct the training values. | The training session is incorrectly categorized due to missing bpm information. | The training is sent wrong to the device after conversion to HR mode. | The training session is incorrectly categorized due to missing bpm information. | The training is sent wrong to the device after conversion to HR mode.

topics.title: [SOLVED] - Coach Jack not working
topics.sample_questions: Blank screen on mobile devices. | Getting a blank page when trying to edit the plan. | Blank screen when accessing Coach Jack. | Getting a blank screen when trying to use Coach Jack.

topics.title: Removing Ant+ from TrainerDay
topics.sample_questions: Lack of clarity on why ANT+ support is being discontinued despite no personal issues. | Uncertainty about when TrainerDay will stop supporting ANT+.

topics.title: [SOLVED] - iOS App crashing after peak of TD Ramp Test
topics.sample_questions: Discarding the workout also causes the app to crash. | App crashes when trying to save after stopping a workout. | Suspects the issue is related to the iPhone since it works on iPads. | App crashes after reaching the peak of the ramp test.

topics.title: STARTS Strenght training on bike
topics.sample_questions: Delay in slope resistance pickup and concerns about risk factors when performing the exercise. | Concerns about the risk of injury and equipment damage while performing STARTS. | Uncertainty about the effectiveness and setup of STARTS strength training on a bike.
